de.fhpotsdam.simpletouch
Class TransformableObject

java.lang.Object
  de.fhpotsdam.simpletouch.TransformableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
TouchObject
public abstract class TransformableObject
extends java.lang.Object

Simple transformable object. rotate(), setOffset(), etc are outer object methods innerRotate(), setInnerOffset(), etc are inner (off-screen buffer) object methods REVISIT For 3D conversion methods need to add one more layer (using screenX, and screenY to convert from world to screen)

public abstract void internalDraw()
The internal draw method. Needs to be implemented in sub classes.

isHit

public boolean isHit(int checkX,
                     int checkY)
Checks whether given screen coordinates are hitting this object.

Parameters:
checkX - Horizontal screen position to hit test.
checkY - Vertical screen position to hit test.
Returns:
true if the given positions are within this object.
